00029 const Matrix OdometryFilter::buildA()
00030 {
00031         //Build System Matrix
00032         Matrix A(constants::ODOM_STATE_SIZE(),constants::ODOM_STATE_SIZE());
00033         A = 0;
00034         for (int r = 1; r <= constants::ODOM_STATE_SIZE(); ++r)
00035         {
00036                 A(r,r) = 1;
00037         }
00038         A(constants::ODOM_X_STATE(),  constants::ODOM_X_DOT_STATE())  = 1;
00039         A(constants::ODOM_Y_STATE(),  constants::ODOM_Y_DOT_STATE())  = 1;
00040         A(constants::ODOM_Z_STATE(),  constants::ODOM_Z_DOT_STATE())  = 1;
00041         A(constants::ODOM_RX_STATE(), constants::ODOM_RX_DOT_STATE()) = 1;
00042         A(constants::ODOM_RY_STATE(), constants::ODOM_RY_DOT_STATE()) = 1;
00043         A(constants::ODOM_RZ_STATE(), constants::ODOM_RZ_DOT_STATE()) = 1;
00044         return A;
00045 }
00046 
00047 const Matrix OdometryFilter::buildB()
00048 {
00049         //Build Input Matrix
00050         Matrix B(12,3);
00051         B = 0;
00052         B(constants::ODOM_X_DOT_STATE(), constants::X_DOT_DOT_INPUT()) = 1;
00053         B(constants::ODOM_Y_DOT_STATE(), constants::Y_DOT_DOT_INPUT()) = 1;
00054         B(constants::ODOM_Z_DOT_STATE(), constants::Z_DOT_DOT_INPUT()) = 1;
00055         return B;
00056 
00057 }
00058 
00059 const Matrix OdometryFilter::buildH()
00060 {
00061 
00062         //Build H Matrix
00063         Matrix H(constants::ODOM_STATE_SIZE(),constants::MEASUREMENT_SIZE());
00064         H = 0;
00065         H(constants::ODOM_RX_DOT_STATE(), constants::RX_DOT_MEASUREMENT()) = 1;
00066         H(constants::ODOM_RY_DOT_STATE(), constants::RY_DOT_MEASUREMENT()) = 1;
00067         H(constants::ODOM_RZ_DOT_STATE(), constants::RZ_DOT_MEASUREMENT()) = 1;
00068         return H;
00069 
00070 }
